objective.title: Phase 6: Integration & Compliance
objective.description: Integrate with existing Phase 2 compliance systems and ensure backward compatibility

custom_requirements:
**Phase 6 Objectives:**
Ensure seamless integration with existing Phase 2 compliance systems and maintain backward compatibility.

**Key Deliverables:**
1. Phase 2 compliance system integration
2. Document validation system integration
3. Timeout monitoring integration
4. Security and access control validation
5. Backward compatibility testing
6. Compliance documentation and certification

**Technical Requirements:**
- Integrate with existing document_validator system
- Support Phase 2 timeout protection mechanisms
- Maintain compatibility with current manage_rule actions
- Implement security controls and access validation
- Support existing file permission controls
- Integrate with context management systems
- Provide compliance audit trails

**Success Criteria:**
- All existing manage_rule actions continue to work
- Phase 2 compliance features fully integrated
- Security controls properly implemented
- Document validation system working seamlessly
- Timeout protection active for all operations
- 100% backward compatibility maintained

completed_actions.details: Task 'Phase 6: Integration & Compliance' created with status 'in_progress'
